name: Spartacats
description: SpartaCats is a spectacular new NFT memecoin DeFi project which aims to bring more users to EVER, than ever! With King Meowdius at our helm, the platform will provide an airdrop of PURR tokens to holders of 20 famous feline projects and unite the crypto cat crowds behind their rightful King! The first 9 worthy projects are already chosen, ready for launch. The remaining half shall be chosen at a rate of one per fortnight by the ‘300 Decentralised foundation’ the holders of legendary (dividend paying) SpartaCat NFTs. And with generous staking and farming allocations, modest team distribution, and the upcoming memecoin wars game arena, you’d better PRE-PURR FOR GLORY!
